mapper.select: /* getCertificateOne */ SELECT IUP.USER_PROOF_SN, IUP.PROOF_TYPE, DATE_FORMAT(IUP.REG_DE, '%Y-%m-%d') AS REG_DE, IUP.SUBMISSION_NAME, DATE_FORMAT(IUP.SUBMISSION_DE, '%Y-%m-%d') AS SUBMISSION_DE, IUP.PRINT_SN, IUP.FIRST_RRN_NAME, IUP.SECOND_RRN_NAME, IUP.USAGE_NAME, IUP.REMARK_NAME, IUP.STATUS, IUP.DOCU_YEAR_DE, IUP.JOB_TITLE, IUP.NUMBER, DI.DOC_ID, DI.APPRO_KEY, DI.DOC_MENU_CD, HEI.EMP_SEQ, HEI.ERP_EMP_SEQ, HEI.EMP_NAME_KR, HEI.DEPT_NAME, HEI.DEPT_TEAM_NAME, HEI.JOB_DETAIL, CASE WHEN HEI.DUTY_NAME IS NULL OR HEI.DUTY_NAME = "" THEN HEI.POSITION_NAME ELSE HEI.DUTY_NAME END AS POSITION_NAME, HEI.BDAY, HEI.ADDR, DATE_FORMAT(HEI.JOIN_DAY, '%Y-%m-%d') AS JOIN_DAY, DATE_FORMAT(HEI.RESIGN_DAY, '%Y-%m-%d') AS RESIGN_DAY, HEI.WORK_STATUS_CODE, HEIA.EMP_SEQ AS APPROVAL_EMP_SEQ, HEIA.EMP_NAME_KR AS APPROVAL_EMP_NAME, IM.FILE_PATH, CONCAT((SELECT DEPT_NAME FROM CAM_HR.DJ_DEPT_INFO WHERE DEPT_SEQ = (SELECT PARENT_DEPT_SEQ FROM CAM_HR.DJ_DEPT_INFO WHERE DEPT_SEQ = HDI.DEPT_SEQ)), ' ', (SELECT DEPT_NAME FROM CAM_HR.DJ_DEPT_INFO WHERE DEPT_SEQ = HDI.DEPT_SEQ)) AS DEPT_FULL_NAME FROM CAM_INSIDE.DJ_USER_PROOF IUP LEFT JOIN CAM_HR.DJ_EMP_INFO HEIA ON IUP.APPROVAL_EMP_SEQ = HEIA.EMP_SEQ LEFT JOIN ( SELECT IM.SIGN2_IMAGE_PK, CONCAT(FI.FILE_PATH, FI.FILE_UUID) AS FILE_PATH, IM.EMP_SEQ FROM CAM_INSIDE.DJ_IMAGE_MANAGE IM LEFT JOIN CAM_COMMON.DJ_FILE_INFO FI ON FI.FILE_NO = IM.SIGN2_IMAGE_PK )IM ON IM.EMP_SEQ = HEIA.EMP_SEQ LEFT JOIN CAM_HR.DJ_EMP_INFO HEI ON IUP.CRTR_SN = HEI.EMP_SEQ LEFT JOIN DJ_CAMTIC.A_DOC_INFO DI ON IUP.DOC_ID = DI.DOC_ID LEFT JOIN CAM_HR.DJ_DEPT_INFO HDI ON HEI.DEPT_SEQ = HDI.DEPT_SEQ WHERE IUP.USER_PROOF_SN = #{userProofSn}
mapper.insert: /* setCertificateInsert */ INSERT INTO CAM_INSIDE.DJ_USER_PROOF ( PROOF_TYPE, REG_DE, REG_ERP_SN, REGTR_NAME, REG_DEPT_NAME, REG_DUTY_NAME, SUBMISSION_NAME, SUBMISSION_DE, PRINT_SN, USAGE_NAME, REMARK_NAME, DOCU_YEAR_DE, CRTR_SN, NUMBER, STATUS ) VALUES ( #{proofType}, #{regDe}, #{regErpSn}, #{regtrName}, #{regDeptName}, #{regDutyName}, #{submissionName}, #{submissionDe}, #{printSn}, #{usageName}, #{remarkName}, LEFT(#{regDe}, 4), #{empSeq}, (SELECT MAX(IUP.NUMBER) +1 FROM CAM_INSIDE.DJ_USER_PROOF IUP WHERE IUP.DOCU_YEAR_DE = LEFT(#{regDe}, 4)), 10 )
mapper.update: /* setCertificateUpdate */ UPDATE CAM_INSIDE.DJ_USER_PROOF SET PROOF_TYPE = #{proofType}, REG_DE = #{regDe}, SUBMISSION_NAME = #{submissionName}, SUBMISSION_DE = #{submissionDe}, PRINT_SN = #{printSn}, FIRST_RRN_NAME = #{firstRrnName}, SECOND_RRN_NAME = #{secondRrnName}, USAGE_NAME = #{usageName}, REMARK_NAME = #{remarkName}, DOCU_YEAR_DE = LEFT(#{regDe}, 4), UPDT_DT = now(), UPDUSR_SN = #{empSeq} WHERE USER_PROOF_SN = #{userProofSn}
/* setCertificateDelete */ UPDATE CAM_INSIDE.DJ_USER_PROOF SET ACTIVE = 'N' WHERE USER_PROOF_SN = #{userProofSn}
/* updateCertifiFinalApprStat */ UPDATE CAM_INSIDE.DJ_USER_PROOF SET STATUS = ${status}, APPROVAL_EMP_SEQ = #{empSeq}, APPROVAL_RESULT_DATE = now() WHERE USER_PROOF_SN = #{userProofSn}
mapper.insert:
/* setCertificateInsert */ INSERT INTO CAM_INSIDE.DJ_USER_PROOF ( PROOF_TYPE, REG_DE, REG_ERP_SN, REGTR_NAME, REG_DEPT_NAME, REG_DUTY_NAME, SUBMISSION_NAME, SUBMISSION_DE, PRINT_SN, FIRST_RRN_NAME, SECOND_RRN_NAME, USAGE_NAME, JOB_TITLE, REMARK_NAME, DOCU_YEAR_DE, CRTR_SN, APPROVAL_EMP_SEQ, APPROVAL_RESULT_DATE, STATUS, NUMBER, ISSUE ) VALUES ( #{proofType}, #{regDe}, #{regErpSn}, #{regtrName}, #{regDeptName}, #{regDutyName}, #{submissionName}, #{submissionDe}, #{printSn}, #{firstRrnName}, #{secondRrnName}, #{usageName}, #{jobTitle}, #{remarkName}, LEFT(#{regDe}, 4), #{empSeq}, #{regEmpSeq}, NOW(), 100, (SELECT MAX(IUP.NUMBER) +1 FROM CAM_INSIDE.DJ_USER_PROOF IUP WHERE IUP.DOCU_YEAR_DE = LEFT(#{regDe}, 4)), 'Y' )
